code: import React from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import'../styles/Campaign.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CampaignCard=_ref=>{let{campaign}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"campaign-card",children:[campaign.image&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"campaign-image",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:campaign.image,alt:campaign.title,onError:e=>e.target.style.display='none'})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"campaign-body",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:campaign.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:campaign.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"campaign-meta",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:["Goal: \u20B9",campaign.goalAmount]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:["Raised: \u20B9",campaign.raisedAmount||0]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:["Status: ",campaign.status?campaign.status.charAt(0).toUpperCase()+campaign.status.slice(1):'']})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"campaign-actions",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/donate/".concat(campaign._id),className:"donate-btn",children:"Donate"})})]})]});};export default CampaignCard;
